distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.AbstractLatLonDist
 
distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.ChebyshevDistance
Calculates the distance between two points using Chebyshev's distance formula.
distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in interface edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.DistanceFunction
Calculates the distance between two points using the formula specific to the implementing class.
distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.EquirectangularDistance
Estimates the unitless distance between two latitude/longitude points using an equirectangular projection.
distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.EuclideanDistance
Calculates the distance between two points using the Euclidean distance formula.
distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.HaversineDistance
Calculates the distance between two latitude/longitude points using the Haversine distance formula.
distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.ManhattanDistance
Calculates the distance between two points using the Manhattan distance formula.
distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.SquaredEquirectangularDistance
Estimates the squared unitless distance between two latitude/longitude points using an equirectangular projection.
distanceBetween(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.SquaredEuclideanDistance
Calculates the distance between two points using the squared Euclidean distance formula.
distanceBetweenKM(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.AbstractLatLonDist
Calculates the distance, in kilometers, between two latitude/longitude points.
distanceBetweenMI(KDPoint, KDPoint) - Method in class edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance.AbstractLatLonDist
Calculates the distance, in miles, between two latitude/longitude points.
DistanceFunction - Interface in edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance
Interface to be implemented with a custom distance function.
Distances - Class in edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance
Class containing factory methods to instantiate various common distance functions that implement the DistanceFunction functional interface.
